mapper.sql: id AS "id", task_number AS "taskNumber", use_request_id AS "useRequestId", process_number AS "processNumber", material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", material_name AS "materialName", material_sku AS "materialSku", material_id AS "materialId", material_serial_number AS "materialSerialNumber", stock_id AS "stockId", loca_number AS "locaNumber", turnover_id AS "turnoverId", lattice_code AS "latticeCode", operator AS "operator", operation_time AS "operationTime", task_state AS "taskState", interface_state AS "interfaceState", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", sorting_type AS "sortingType", sorting_status AS "sortingStatus", sorting_task AS "sortingTask"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_warehouse_tool_use_task where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')
and use_request_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.useRequestId},'%')
and process_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.processNumber},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and material_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialId},'%')
and material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSerialNumber},'%')
and stock_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.stockId},'%')
and loca_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.locaNumber},'%')
and turnover_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.turnoverId},'%')
and lattice_code like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeCode},'%')
and operator like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operator},'%')
and operation_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operationTime},'%')
and task_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskState},'%')
and interface_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.interfaceState},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')

select
from wms_warehouse_tool_use_task where (task_state = '0' or task_state = '1' or task_state = '2' ) and operator = #{paramCondition.operator}
